alert.note: Alert for Custer; Pennington (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 1:30PM MDT until June 29 at 2:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: The National Weather Service in Rapid City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... North central Custer County in southwestern South Dakota... Southwestern Pennington County in west central South Dakota... * Until 230 PM MDT. * At 129 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 3 miles northeast of Hayward, or 11 miles south of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Southern Rapid City and Reptile Gardens around 135 PM MDT. Hermosa and Hart Ranch around 145 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Black Gap, Rapid City Airport, Thompson Butte and Caputa. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
